scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev:windows
scripts.test: npm run prettier-check && cd client && npm test
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.publish-all: npm publish --workspaces --access public && npm publish --access public
scripts.test:e2e:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:6274 && cd client && npm run test:e2e" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e:dev:windows: concurrently "npm run dev:windows" "wait-on http://localhost:6274 && cd client && npm run test:e2e" --kill-others --success first
